values: 舞台；阶段，时期；步，步骤
A stage is a place where actors or musicians act or sing.
A large screen was on the stage.

上演； 筹划
To stage is to organize or plan an event or performance.
A stage is a raised platform or area on which actors or performers present a play, concert, or other form of entertainment.
noun, verb
